name: SugarSky
description:
Use the arrow keys to move horizontally, press Space to jump. Press z for a temporary speed boost.

Eat clouds smaller than you, and avoid clouds bigger than you.

Grow 20 times to advance to the next level.

After ending the 4th level, the game resets.

This prototype was made in my first months of learning game development in Unity engine, i thought that though simple, it is somewhat cute and fun to play enough for sharing. :)

[Known bugs]

If Space bar is pressed multiple times while the game is paused on the "Start" screen, the player's face will fly away :v
